profile_summary:
As a Senior AI Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging **React**, **Next.js**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and modern AI frameworks to develop advanced, high-performance applications. I possess strong expertise in building and integrating **APIs** and utilizing **AI** technologies including **LLMs** and vector databases like **Pinecone** and **Weaviate**, alongside tools such as **OpenAI**, **Anthropic**, and **Hugging Face** to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

I have a proven track record in developing enterprise-grade platforms and optimizing machine learning workflows for predictive analytics and real-time processing. My comprehensive knowledge of **CI/CD** practices and experience in developing microservices and event-driven architectures ensure the delivery of secure and compliant applications aligned with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My hands-on experience extends to implementing machine learning pipelines and deploying ML models in production environments using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. I am dedicated to driving innovation through technology while maintaining excellence in performance and security.
